MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  ML2 postcode area of Wishaw, affecting properties in Charles Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 07:04am. Our engineers are on their way to the Meadowcraig substation to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:27am on Tuesday the 9th of February 2021
